components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: MMS Delivery Delays to a Subset of Twilio US Shortcodes

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in MMS delivery delays when sending messages to  a subset of Twilio US Shortcodes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing MMS delivery delays when sending messages to a subset of Twilio US Shortcodes. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - EE

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner EE United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 February 2025 at 14:00 PST until 13 February 2025 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for EE United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup Identity Match
CARRIER NETWORK - Lookup SIM Swap

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Celcom and DiGi

incident_updates.body: The Celcom and DiGi networks in Malaysia are conducting a planned maintenance from 14 February 2025 at 08:00 PST until 14 February 2025 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Celcom and DiGi Malaysia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, APAC

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Norway, France, Croatia, Italy, the Netherlands, Estonia, Hungary, Bulgaria, Denmark, Indonesia, the United Kingdom, the Czech Republic, Mexico, Ukraine, Austria, Costa Rica, Brazil, Finland, Ireland, Peru and Sweden is conducting an emergency maintenance from 15 February 2025 at 14:00 PST until 15 February 2025 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Norway, France, Croatia, Italy, Netherlands, Estonia, Hungary, Bulgaria, Denmark, Indonesia, United Kingdom, Czech Republic, Mexico, Ukraine, Austria, Costa Rica, Brazil, Finland, Ireland, Peru and Sweden phone numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Latin America
CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, APAC
CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Europe

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Yota and MegaFon

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Yota and MegaFon networks in Russia are conducting a series of emergency maintenances from 12 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 13 February 2025 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Yota and MegaFon Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

12 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 12 February 2025 at 16:00 PST
13 February 2025 at 12:00 PST until 13 February 2025 at 16:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Europe
